## ResolveContext type

Context object passed to the onResolve callback. Contains computed values and merged config for the error.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ResolveContext<TConfig extends ErrorXBaseConfig = ErrorXBaseConfig> = {
    uiMessage: string | undefined;
    docsUrl: string;
    i18nKey: string;
    errorType: string;
    config: TConfig;
};
```
**References:** [ErrorXBaseConfig](./error-x.errorxbaseconfig.md)
